course.title: PSY 4134 Community Psychology (3 units)
course.desc: History and definition. Community perspective on mental health, social intervention, prevention, health promotion and research methods. Role of community psychologists. Current research in community psychology.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: 81 university units including PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 2110. Reserved for students registered in the Major, Joint Honours and Honours programs in psychology.
